document.heading: Conversion Fee Clarification and Technical Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-354, the “Conversion Fee Clarification and Technical Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-179 which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 16, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-688 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-354 became effective on March 25, 2009.
